carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.cactusWren: When the cactus is in the off-hand position, the blocks released are in the opposite direction.
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.dragonBrea: Added reasonable recipes for Dragon's Breath.
Can be synthesized into dragon breath
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.dragonEggR: Added reasonable recipes for dragon eggs.
Can be crafted into dragon eggs
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.entryNotic: Players will be shown a configurable prompt when entering the server
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.glowingHop: The hopper minecart will glow red when locked, and white when locked.
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.keepOpenin: The same player can always open the same treasure house.
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.lockAllHop: All hoppers are locked regardless of whether they receive a redstone signal or not.
All hopper minecarts are locked regardless of whether they have powered active rails underneath them.
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.safeMagmaB: You will no longer lose health when standing on a magma block.
Magma blocks that don’t burn your feet
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.sitOnTheGr: Squat down multiple times to sit on the ground.
carpetajiaddition.carpet.rule.useMachine: When this rule is turned on, Google Translate will be used for all languages ​​except zh_cn, including this sentence; when this rule is turned off, only zh_cn will be used.
